ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.box2d
Class Box2DBody

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.box2d.Box2DBody

public class Box2DBody
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a body in the Box2D physics world. It contains a Body object, which is a rigid body as well as a BodyDef object, that holds all the information necessary to create a rigid body. This is the physical equivalent of a ShapeNode in the library. If the physics simulation is used, every ShapeNode has an associated Box2DBody.

Constructor Detail

Box2DBody

public Box2DBody(javax.vecmath.Vector2f position,
                 Box2DWorld world,
                 Box2DShape shape,
                 boolean hasMass,
                 boolean createJoint)
Instantiates a new box2 d body.

Parameters:
position - the position of the object
world - a reference to the Box2DWorld
shape - the corresponding Box2DShape of this body
hasMass - a boolean indicating whether this body has a mass, i.e. whether it is affected by gravity
createJoint - Joints are used for user interactions. Disable if a body shouldn't be moved.
